author: jleroux
msg: Changes method="POST" to method="post", from Scott's comment about XHTML

author: markt
msg: Fix DBCP-203. Provide an option to specify the class loader to be used to load the JDBC driver for a BasicDataSource.
Based on a patch suggested by Mark Grand.

author: jukka
msg: Add license headers to language profiles.
Remove all but three-letter ngrams to reduce the size of the tika-core jar. Only three-letter ngrams are used for now.

author: covener
msg: CharsetOptions NoImplicitAdd makes us fall through to the "unknown option" clause
due to breaking "else if", making NoImplicitAdd unconfigurable.
